urls.title: Reduce the Environmental Impact of Oil
urls.description: The Oil Care Campaign is a joint initiative to provide advice - helping you look after, recycle and reduce the environmental risk of oil

tweets.text:
Any oil leak, no matter how small, can be devastating for aquatic wildlife, birds and fish.

After the recent cold weather now is a good time to check your domestic oil tank for weakened joints and damaged underground pipes.

For more information: https://t.co/UF6jGHz65H https://t.co/Z9RY2UySjj

tweets.text: Just to remind you all that just 24 hours ago the @EnvAgency admitted it will no longer be publishing serious pollution incidents and won't be recording them against their annual performance targets. https://t.co/Cu3VPjycTa

Brilliant end to the wk hearing that @southribblebc Planning Committee last night gave it‚Äôs support to @EnvAgencyNW #Preston #SouthRibble #flood defence project. üôèüëç Paper at https://t.co/cG6TDxQ9Zk https://t.co/zg6vFm87vh
Thanks @RedIndustries2 and @EnvAgencyMids for the 4 hours sleep between last night's stench and a fresh wave this morning from Walleys landfill #StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL
@cllr_potter If @EnvAgency are saying NWRR option is no longer being considered to @ShropCouncil then they need to say it publically too!
üö®Extraordinary. Latest statement by   @EnvAgencyMids relating to the foul odours FROM Walleys Quarry LandFill. https://t.co/d231VXevQS https://t.co/Jx7eUsURgp

@EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids Walley‚Äôs Quarry is generating 80% of all odour complaints England ... @JamesBevanEA is that not good enough for you to act? Does it need to be a world record breaking health disaster first? @JamesBevanEA @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink @PHE_uk https://t.co/cFQufhn4j3

urls.title: Shropshire floods: Environment Agency launches project to protect 3,000 homes and 1,000 businesses along River Severn
urls.description: The Environment Agency has begun work to protect up to 3,000 homes and 1,000 businesses along the River Severn from flooding.

tweets.text: Very pleased to see alternative solutions are being considered including better reservoir management  #slowtheflow #shropshire #loton  https://t.co/rXTEi7cVDV
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids Enough is enough, this has gone too far
@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids its bribery, clear as day. RED CEo Been onto them. only explanation!! the dept needs investigating

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids I‚Äôve just written to the EA with a FOI request about the number of complaints for the last 3 years and the comparison of those figures to other sites in the U.K... I‚Äôm not optimistic that a response will be forthcoming
@WasteCrimeWatch @EnvAgency I'm fed up with all this #flytipping I'm seriously thinking of getting a waste carrier's license and doing some rubbish removing in my spare time.

@MissMaisyDaisy @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 @StinkStopthe Awful in the Westlands this morning too (from about 3am) @EnvAgencyMids - wasting my morning on hold and lodging complaints. Kids complaining. @ClareDinnisEA & @JamesBevanEA doing a stellar job - show some accountability please.

urls.title: Walleys Quarry Landfill Site - Latest Update - Environment Agency - Citizen Space
urls.description: Find and participate in consultations run by the Environment Agency

tweets.text:
‚ÄºÔ∏èüö® WALLEY'S - CONFIRMED BREACH OF SITE PERMIT üö®‚ÄºÔ∏è

The @EnvAgencyMids have confirmed a breach of the site permit. This is very concerning.

Clearly the odour *is* causing annoyance. I will continue to put the pressure on with the EA and at Westminster.

https://t.co/9vl5xaQgzq https://t.co/Cae8tqcrf3

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids Thankyou for investigating, its 00.10, no one can sleep, stench is all through our property & we can't get it out, faces covered in Vick to try to mask smell, it barely does, going to be another long night, not sure how many more of these we can take.

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids Are they incompetent? Why has this been changed? Why during the critical incident last week, when they could not handle the numbers of calls...the Monitor was faulty, they couldn‚Äôt send any one, They have excuse after excuse...They are not fit to regulate!!! #stopthestink

The @EnvAgencyMids have now changed this text to "minor breach" (with no note of correction).

They need to provide urgent clarification as to why, and details of who asked them to make this change.

https://t.co/9vl5xaQgzq https://t.co/Y8O5rAs0qn

Absolutely disgusted @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids no investigation, monitoring conveniently not working, lying about nos of complaints. It‚Äôs either corruption or incompetence- which one is it?! #StopTheStink

At the beginning of the week the River Meon north of River Lane looked like left image naturally using its floodplain. Right image is what it looks like today as once again the landowner has blocked it off Such a shame it can‚Äôt be left to do its thing @EnvAgency @HantsIWWildlife https://t.co/5oTCQKKsta
@MissMaisyDaisy @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe What a joke! @StinkStopThe #StopTheStink

Following months of delays due to poor weather, the @ChesterHouse_UK mooring construction is now underway and due to be completed later this month. @nenescape @EnvAgency @_NeneValley @ChesterHouse_UK @HeritageFundUK @NNorthantsC https://t.co/GeCcAsIuE4
@EnvAgency you are a disgrace. You won‚Äôt dredge the rivers. It‚Äôs causing littering on farmland from flooding. https://t.co/RAUEvQeANG
@JamesRCutting @Trevor_Codlin @EnvAgency @HantsIWWildlife Actually, the fishing would be better with the flood plain as there would be stronger flows for longer into the summer.

urls.title: Get involved in the National Waste Crime Survey 2021
urls.description: Farmers impacted by large-scale waste crime are being urged to give their views through a new survey which will aid the fight against criminal activity.

tweets.text: We're asking our members who have been impacted by large-scale waste crime to take part in the @EnvAgency's National Waste Crime Survey 2021. You have until the 22 March to have your say. Visit NFU Online for further details üëâ https://t.co/5lQzDPg2IU https://t.co/06vC4DnTTG
